answers.answer: My sweet tooth ended in gestational diabetes talk to your Dr and have them check your sugar

I'm 36 weeks, I've had the glucose test & everything was fine. I feel like I'm eating more sugar now than I was then though so I will check with my doctor and make sure everything is still ok. Thanks!
I caught a crazy sweet tooth @ 28 weeks out of nowhere failed the 1 hour test but passed the 2hour one this time.
There is no rda for sugar because ur body doesn't need any added sugars.  Be careful!  Eat sweets sparingly.

question: Does anyone know the RDA for sugar for pregnant women? I can't really find a direct answer and all I want to eat is sugar ALL of the time.
title: sweet tooth
